trans-unit.source: Animates from the <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> value of the previous key frame to its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value*> using linear interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 从进行动画处理<xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref>到其自身上一个关键帧的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value*>使用线性内插。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrameCollection>结合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames>要进行动画处理<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>根据一组关键帧的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Thickness> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧定义的一个段<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames>它所属。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames>

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每个关键帧具有目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>指定的时间关键帧的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A>应到达。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧动画应用到其自己的目标值的上一个关键帧的目标值。

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: 它将启动时上一个关键帧结束，并在达到其自己的关键时间时结束。

trans-unit.source: Linear key frames like LinearThicknessKeyFrame create a smooth, linear interpolation between values.
trans-unit.target: 如 LinearThicknessKeyFrame 线性关键帧创建值之间平滑、 线性内的插。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearThicknessKeyFrame"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearThicknessKeyFrame"></xref>使用指定的结束值的类。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 结束关键帧的值 （也称为"目标值"）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearThicknessKeyFrame"></xref>类指定的结束值和关键时间。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 结束关键帧的值 （也称为"目标值"）。

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的关键时间。

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: 关键时间确定时也关键帧的结束时达到目标值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearThicknessKeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearThicknessKeyFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新实例。

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, in a linear fashion, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: 在上一个关键帧值和当前关键帧，使用提供的进度增量的值之间以线性方式内, 插。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 动画起始值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 介于 0.0 和 1.0，（含)，该值指定此关键帧已经过去的时间的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 此关键帧的输出值给定了指定的基值和进度。
